ygData.subject: Disenchant and Antimagic Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Greeting fellow Bards, I was under the impression that the Antimagic Song was an AOE or party only that prevented harmful spells from being cast on the party
ygData.messageBody:
Greeting fellow Bards,
I was under the impression that the Antimagic Song was an AOE or party only
that prevented harmful spells from being cast on the party by any attacking
mobs. I watched my husband and his group in beta attack the Karanas Ogre
camp and they specifically had a L40+ bard to sing this song to prevent
members from being charmed.
I tried Disenchant last night after a group member was rez'ed and it did not
dispell the Rez effect. It was effecting my whole party but no one reported
losing any buffs.
Is it possible the Disenchanting song and the Antimagic song effects have
been completely switched in the multitude of patches and tweaks/nerfs since
beta?

Just wondering out Loud,

Lady Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Knight Marshall, Order of the Rose
Excalibur, (Xegony L33)
